divs: sighting detailswas standing at deer camp in the dark. looked to northeast & saw bright, bright lights that just appeared from no where at a distance of aproximately 5 miles. became brighter & wider ( would guess total light configuration about 1\2 to 1 mile wide)moving rapidly to the north west.first thought it was 2 bomber aircraft going to dyess af base in abilene. but no blinking lights like a standard aircraft & absolutely no noise at all. also flying way to close for 2 aircraft. suddenly disappeared for about 5 minutes, then reappeared about 10 miles from spot last spotted & back where i originally spotted the lights the first time. this time moving much slower than any aircraft could without losing altitude & crashing. watched for another 10 minutes than "like turning off a light switch" was gone. my son & his friend were driving to the deer lease from ft worth at about the same time i spotted the lights. they were between rising star & brownwood when they saw the bright lights . as soon as they got to deer camp they asked if i had seen it & what was it?? i was in the air force for 4 1\2 years & a aircraft maint officer. these bright, bright, lights with absolutely no sound were not aircraft. have never witnessed anything like this before in my life. closest thing would have to be a meteor shower or falling star.but this was more intense & lasted so much longer.
Summary: Bright object just dropped out of clouds!
